content:
Based on the execution logs and entity data, I'll generate a comprehensive report:

# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation (43.0, -84.0)
- Burner mining drill extracting coal
- Wooden chest at (43.5, -82.5) collecting coal output

### Copper Production Line (-28.0, -61.0)
- Burner mining drill extracting copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0) smelting copper plates
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5) moving plates to storage
- Wooden chest at (-22.5, -58.5) storing copper plates

### Iron Production Line (-17.0, -52.0)
- Burner mining drill extracting iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-15.5, -52.5) collecting ore
- Burner inserter at (-14.5, -51.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-14.0, -50.0) smelting iron plates
- Wooden chest at (-11.5, -50.5) for plate storage

### Automation Science Pack Assembly (-15.5, -45.5)
- Assembling machine producing automation science packs
- Support inserters and chests for input/output
- Connected to electricity network via small electric pole

### Iron Gear Wheel Assembly (-3.5, -44.5)
- Assembling machine producing iron gear wheels
- Support inserters and chests for input/output
- Connected to electricity network

### Power Generation System (-5.0, 23.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) providing water
- Underground pipe system connecting water flow
- Boiler at (-5.0, 23.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-0.5, 25.5) generating electricity
- Connected pipe groups for water (system 8542) and steam (system 8544)
- Electric pole network distributing power (ID: 107838)

# ERROR TIPS

### Pipe Placement Errors
- Ensure target location is clear of existing entities before placing pipes
- Avoid placing pipes directly on water tiles
- Check entity footprint overlap before placement

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in burner devices to prevent fuel shortages
- Ensure sufficient materials are available before attempting insertions

### Assembly Line Issues
- Verify all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor input/output chest contents to prevent bottlenecks

# NAMESPACE

### Variables
- `iron_furnace`: Entity (Furnace)
- `copper_furnace`: Entity (Furnace)
- `coal_chest`: Entity (Chest)

### Functions
- `insert_item(prototype: Prototype, target: Entity, quantity: int) -> Entity`
  - Success: When target entity accepts items and inventory has sufficient quantity
  - Failure: When inventory lacks required items or target cannot accept more

- `extract_items(source: Entity, quantity: int) -> None`
  - Success: When source contains extractable items
  - Failure: When attempting to extract more than available
